p: Cyanoacrylate‐type adhesive compound (Aron Alpha, TOAGOSEI) was dropped on backed perilla herb. A glass slide coated with ITO (Bruker Daltonics) was pressed on the sample to transfer epidermal tissue. The release paper film was pressed on the peeled epidermal tissue to crush the oil glands. Optical images of the tissue were obtained using a microscope scanner (Nanozoomer, Hamamatsu Photonics, Shizuoka, Japan) before analysis by MALDI‐MSI (Supporting information).
